[bq="Outofcontextjojo"]Jojo is amazing for one reason; it’s not the fights, it’s not the characters. The reason is that they can take a break and have a turtle explain multiple personality syndrome to you and have it still fit the story.[/bq]

topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ad63fe6368720cac000d50#post_55ad63fe6368720cac000d50
Not going to happen cause butthurt people would use it to create a hugbox.  What always happens on sites with block features is butthurt people block everyone that disagree with them then start spouting shit and start going "lol I blocked you".  Which would you rather have current derpibooru or a bunch of tumblrites moving in claiming this is "their" site?

topics.body:
"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ad6537636872283f002726#post_55ad6537636872283f002726
Current derpibooru arguments in a nutshell, "Your favorite anime is shit!"  "Well your waifu is shit!" "Your fetish is shit!"  "Your favorite video game is shit!"  "You fuck your uncle!"  "You fuck your uncle!"  "You're a bone bitting bastard uncle fucker!"  "You don't eat or sleep or do the lawn you just fuck your uncle all day long!"
(yes I wanted to do a south park reference)

If derpibooru installed a block feature, "Why is the world so misogynistic against us demisexual genderfluid otherkin dragonkins?  Discrimination against us that have souls of dragons is misogyny!  Report any cis shits to the mods so we can create a safe space!  Kill cis shits!"
